page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN HOLMESFIELD
page.content: Employment is scarce in our area due to its{rural nature}.Most people who live in the area commute to{Sheffield, {Chesterfield}or{Dronfield}. { Agricultural labour}is the main source of employment but{intensive {farming restricts}opportunities.A local,250 acre,intensive _mixed farm, only needed to employ 3 workers in addition to the farmer and his wife.{ {Family ownership}further{restricts} opportunities for employment.A primary school,kennels,2 public houses,a snack _bar,a caravan site and the large houses provide the other sources of employment.
